name: berlin
comment: HF targeted for July 2020 following the Muir Glacier HF

Bls12381G1AddGas.d: Gas cost of a single BLS12-381 G1 addition precompile-call

Bls12381G1MulGas.d: Gas cost of a single BLS12-381 G1 multiplication precompile-call

Bls12381G2AddGas.d: Gas cost of a single BLS12-381 G2 addition precompile-call

Bls12381G2MulGas.d: Gas cost of a single BLS12-381 G2 multiplication precompile-call

Bls12381PairingBaseGas.d: Base gas cost of BLS12-381 pairing check

Bls12381PairingPerPairGas.d: Per-pair gas cost of BLS12-381 pairing check

Bls12381MapG1Gas.d: Gas cost of BLS12-381 map field element to G1

Bls12381MapG2Gas.d: Gas cost of BLS12-381 map field element to G2
